backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining job post types, user profiles, access control, and CRUD operations with admin checks.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and CSS variables defining color tokens and theme styling for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all public and admin routes wrapped in layout, guards, and an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSetti: Provides a dialog for viewing and saving the Gemini API key to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Ima: Editor for image/banner block fields including URL, alt text, and a live preview.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Lin: Editor for link button blocks allowing editing of label text and target URL.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Par: Editor for paragraph blocks providing a textarea to update text content.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Tab: Provides a UI for editing table blocks, allowing row/column management and cell updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Tit: Renders controls for editing a title blockâ€™s text and heading level.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteJobP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a job post, showing name and disabling actions during deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobPostBlo: Editor for managing job post content blocks, allowing adding, reordering, deleting, and editing various block types.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobPostFor: Main form for creating or editing job posts, handling text fields, uploads, lists, links, and block-based content.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManageDail: Admin panel to create, validate, and publish the daily quiz, with form inputs and status display.
frontend/src/components/admin/PhotoUploa: Floating tool for uploading images, storing them locally, previewing, and copying the image or HTML code.
frontend/src/components/AiChatModal.tsx: AI chat modal handling message display, Gemini API calls using a stored API key, and error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied or login required message, with a login button if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminPasswo: Modal prompting for the admin password and handling unlock logic with feedback.
Shows a locked admin access message and triggers the admin password modal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by checking identity, admin status, and local unlock state before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for authentication edge cases.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component rendering a fallback UI and reset button on runtime errors.
frontend/src/components/FloatingSocialBu: Renders floating WhatsApp, Telegram, and AI chat buttons and controls the AI chat modal state.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyQuizSe: Displays the daily quiz with options, selection handling, correctness feedback, and explanation.
frontend/src/components/home/Preparation: Shows preparation resources including books, courses, and test series using fetched data.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickOffici: Renders a list of official links with optional highlighting and external navigation.
frontend/src/components/home/SimpleJobsS: Displays quick job listings filtered by search query and links to notifications.
frontend/src/components/home/StudyCorner: Shows study material categories with accordion UI and external links for resources.
frontend/src/components/home/VerticalTic: Creates an auto-scrolling vertical ticker with reduced-motion handling and pause on hover.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/Impor: Displays apply, notification, and website buttons with availability checks for a job post.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/JobDe: Renders tables for important dates, fees, age limits, and other job details using dynamic post data.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/JobPo: Renders job post content blocks including titles, paragraphs, links, images, and tables.
Displays a job poster image with fallback gradient header when the image is missing or fails.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/Usefu: Shows a table of admit card, syllabus, notification, and website links with availability indicators.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalBann: Shows a static motivational banner with stylized text.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with header, navigation, search, theme toggle, modals, and global wrappers.
frontend/src/components/SiteNoticeTicker: Displays a scrolling marquee notice ticker with repeated announcement text.
frontend/src/contexts/JobSearchContext.t: Provides context for storing and updating the job search query throughout the app.
frontend/src/features/dailyQuiz/dailyQui: Manages daily quiz data in localStorage, including publish, retrieve, and clear operations.
frontend/src/features/homeCards/homeCard: Handles CRUD and persistence for home card items with default seeded entries.
frontend/src/features/officialLinks/offi: Manages official links list with CRUD, reordering, and initial default seeding in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/preparationResourc: Stores and updates preparation resources like books and test series with full CRUD support.
frontend/src/features/simpleJobs/simpleJ: Manages simple job listings with add, delete, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/features/studyCorner/studyC: Tracks study categories and items with CRUD operations and default preset content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmitCardPosts.ts: Fetches admit card job posts via react-query using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientAdminAuth.ts: Manages client admin unlock state in localStorage with login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyQuiz.ts: Subscribes to daily quiz data in localStorage and exposes publish functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeCards.ts: Provides CRUD operations for home card items stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and context provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks if the current authenticated identity is an admin via actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPost.ts: Fetches a single job post by ID through the actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPostMutations.t: Provides add, update, and delete mutations for job posts and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPosts.ts: Fetches job posts filtered by category via actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLinks.ts: Manages official links list in localStorage with CRUD and reorder operations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreparationResourc: Handles books and test series resources in localStorage with full CRUD operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimpleJobs.ts: Manages simple job entries stored in localStorage with add/remove operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyCorner.ts: Manages study categories and items in localStorage with CRUD operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyllabusRepository: Fetches syllabus-related job posts through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemePreference.ts: Controls light/dark theme preference with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, theming, and custom styles including KBC quiz UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with forms and dialogs to manage official links, study corner categories/items, daily quiz, and settings using various hooks and toast alerts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditJobPos: Page for creating or editing a job post, loading existing data when editing and submitting via job post mutation hooks.
Admin interface to list, create, edit, and delete job posts with confirmation dialogs and category labeling.
frontend/src/pages/AdmitCardHallPage.tsx: Displays and filters admit card posts with loading, error, and empty states, showing status and links for each post.
frontend/src/pages/CheckYourAgePage.tsx: Provides an age calculator allowing users to input dates and view computed years, months, and days with validation.
frontend/src/pages/ClientAdminPage.tsx: Implements a password-protected admin panel for managing jobs, links, home cards, preparation resources, and API keys.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with categorized job sections, fallback items, search filtering, and multiple featured components.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed job post information including hero banner, content blocks, links, and tables with full loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SyllabusRepositoryPag: Lists syllabus posts with search, status indicators, and direct download links along with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/linkAvailability.ts: Utility returning availability status and label based on whether a URL is present.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageStore.ts: LocalStorage wrapper providing key-scoped listeners, snapshot caching, and reactive get/set behavior.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Defines project state for adding an Admin Dashboard settings modal to store a Gemini API key in localStorage, including existing features and a pending request. Contains metadata, architectural notes, and versioned feature entries.
